channel.title: Can't Hear Scientist Telling Me to Go in Xen Portal
channel.description: In the end of the Lambda Core chapter, you're supposed to hear the scientist telling you to get in the Xen portal. Unfortunately, I couldn't hear him giving me the OK due to the aliens attacking. Good thing I had captions on to be aware of this. Please make him loud enough for everyone to hear him when he gives the OK.

item.title: Can't Hear Scientist Telling Me to Go in Xen Portal
item.dc:creator: Morloc
item.description:
This is currently being looked into . Thanks for the feedback

Read full topic
item.source: Can't Hear Scientist Telling Me to Go in Xen Portal

item.title: Can't Hear Scientist Telling Me to Go in Xen Portal
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
In the end of the Lambda Core chapter, you’re supposed to hear the scientist telling you to get in the Xen portal. Unfortunately, I couldn’t hear him giving me the OK due to the aliens attacking. Good thing I had captions on to be aware of this. Please make him loud enough for everyone to hear him when he gives the OK.
